name: OBJECTIVE: FEED THE DUCKS
description:
It's the first day of Spring, and you're ready. You're determined. You're well equipped for the job. What job, you may ask? Well, isn't it obvious? You've taken it upon yourself to be the hero your local park needs. You've shouldered a personal and intimate responsibility to this location's wildlife. You are no more and no less than a mallard messiah in your jurisdiction. You. Will. Feed. The. Ducks.

Or not. You could also just explore around a small park area if you desire. It's ultimately up to you!

This game is my entry to the May 2022 Bitsy Jam, whose theme this month was "Duck."  I wasn't initially going to participate in this month’s bitsy jam, but it's been one of those weeks that I felt like I needed something small and lighthearted to work on. It's a short little experience with only 9 screens total and 10 ducks to feed within them. I hope you find it goofy and whimsical, but no matter what you think, thank you very much for playing!
